title: Tesla shares surge 19% and head for best day in more than 3 years on Musk's 2025 growth projection
content: Tesla shares soared 19% Thursday, putting the stock on pace for its best day in over three years, following its better-than-expected third-quarter earnings.
summary: Tesla shares soared 19% Thursday, putting the stock on pace for its best day in over three years, following its better-than-expected third-quarter earnings.

title: French trader bet over $28 million on Trump election win using 4 Polymarket accounts
content: Supporters of Donald Trump, including Elon Musk, have touted shifting election odds on Polymarket even as polls largely show a tight race with Kamala Harris.
summary: Supporters of Donald Trump, including Elon Musk, have touted shifting election odds on Polymarket even as polls largely show a tight race with Kamala Harris.

title: Air taxi firm Lilium's shares plunge 57% after company says main subsidiaries will file for insolvency
content: Shares of Lilium tanked Thursday after the air taxi firm said in a filing that its two main subsidiaries plan on filing for insolvency in the coming days.
summary: Shares of Lilium tanked Thursday after the air taxi firm said in a filing that its two main subsidiaries plan on filing for insolvency in the coming days.

title: U.S. will be ‘more pro-crypto’ after this election, no matter who wins, says Ripple CEO Garlinghouse
content: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse is a big cynic on U.S. crypto regulation, but highly optimistic about the post-election environment around the corner.
summary: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse is a big cynic on U.S. crypto regulation, but highly optimistic about the post-election environment around the corner.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: A poorly timed IPO?
content: Some cite unique elements of the listing as factors in its faltering IPO. Others, however, say sitting on the sidelines means losing out on long-term gains.
summary: Some cite unique elements of the listing as factors in its faltering IPO. Others, however, say sitting on the sidelines means losing out on long-term gains.

title: Britain announces major change to fiscal rules to free up billions in spending
content: U.K. Finance Minister Rachel Reeves on Thursday confirmed she intends to change the country's fiscal rules in the October budget.
summary: U.K. Finance Minister Rachel Reeves on Thursday confirmed she intends to change the country's fiscal rules in the October budget.

title: Another European Central Bank member says a jumbo cut is on the table
content: The ECB's Mārtiņš Kazāks joined his colleague Mario Centeno in saying a 50-basis-point rate cut should be on the table at the central bank's December meeting.
summary: The ECB's Mārtiņš Kazāks joined his colleague Mario Centeno in saying a 50-basis-point rate cut should be on the table at the central bank's December meeting.

title: Presidential election is a dead heat though Trump leads Harris big on economy, says CNBC survey
content: Trump leads Harris 48%-46%, according to the CNBC All-America Economic Survey, within the poll's 3.1% margin of error.
summary: Trump leads Harris 48%-46%, according to the CNBC All-America Economic Survey, within the poll's 3.1% margin of error.

title: Nvidia doubles down on India with Hindi language model and major partnerships
content: Nvidia on Thursday announced a slew of partnerships with major Indian firms and launched a Hindi language model.
summary: Nvidia on Thursday announced a slew of partnerships with major Indian firms and launched a Hindi language model.

title: Warren Buffett — worried about impersonators — says he doesn't endorse candidates or investments
content: Buffett's actions were triggered in part by a fake political endorsement alerted to him on Meta's Instagram.
summary: Buffett's actions were triggered in part by a fake political endorsement alerted to him on Meta's Instagram.

title: 'On vacation every single day': I left the U.S. to live in Vietnam and only need to work 15 hours a week
content: Kavi Vu, 33, moved to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam in August 2023. Today, she lives on about $1,500 a month, according to documents reviewed.
summary: Kavi Vu, 33, moved to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam in August 2023. Today, she lives on about $1,500 a month, according to documents reviewed.

title: Barclays shares hit nine-year high after third quarter profit jumps 23%, beating expectations
content: British bank Barclays on Thursday reported £1.6 billion ($2 billion) net profit attributable to shareholders for the third quarter, beating expectations.
summary: British bank Barclays on Thursday reported £1.6 billion ($2 billion) net profit attributable to shareholders for the third quarter, beating expectations.

title: Chinese smartphone maker Oppo doubles down on AI, says in regular talks with Google and Microsoft
content: As Chinese smartphone company Oppo gears up for a flagship phone launch overseas, it says it has weekly AI talks with Google and Microsoft senior management.
summary: As Chinese smartphone company Oppo gears up for a flagship phone launch overseas, it says it has weekly AI talks with Google and Microsoft senior management.

title: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix posts record quarterly profit as AI boom drives demand
content: Revenue for the third quarter grew about 94% year-on-year.
summary: Revenue for the third quarter grew about 94% year-on-year.

title: A 'tidal wave' of natural gas supply — the biggest yet — will reshape global markets, says RBC Capital
content: The expansion is likely to lead to a state of oversupply by the end of 2026, analysts such as RBC's Adnan Dhanani have projected.
summary: The expansion is likely to lead to a state of oversupply by the end of 2026, analysts such as RBC's Adnan Dhanani have projected.

title: Why the Japanese yen is hovering near three-month lows against the dollar
content: The yen hit a low of 153.18 against the greenback, its weakest since July 31.
summary: The yen hit a low of 153.18 against the greenback, its weakest since July 31.

title: Tim Cook is likely visiting China to bolster support for Apple Intelligence, analysts say
content: The CEO met with China's Minister of Industry and Information Technology as well as the heads of some local companies, including China Mobile and Weibo.
summary: The CEO met with China's Minister of Industry and Information Technology as well as the heads of some local companies, including China Mobile and Weibo.

title: Boeing machinists reject new labor contract, extending more than 5-week strike
content: Boeing machinists walked off the job on Sept. 13 after overwhelmingly rejecting an earlier proposal.
summary: Boeing machinists walked off the job on Sept. 13 after overwhelmingly rejecting an earlier proposal.

title: Southwest and activist investor Elliott strike deal to keep CEO Bob Jordan, add six new directors
content: Southwest Airlines stuck a deal with activist Elliott which staves off a potential proxy fight in exchange for sizable board representation.
summary: Southwest Airlines stuck a deal with activist Elliott which staves off a potential proxy fight in exchange for sizable board representation.

title: Tesla shares jump on profit beat, Musk's prediction of at least 20% 'vehicle growth' next year
content: Tesla reported better-than-expected profit in its third-quarter earnings report on Wednesday.
summary: Tesla reported better-than-expected profit in its third-quarter earnings report on Wednesday.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Treasury yields have made a return, like an unwelcome ex
content: Like an unwelcome ex-partner who shows up during the most inopportune times and refuses to leave, Treasury yields too have been hogging the market limelight.
summary: Like an unwelcome ex-partner who shows up during the most inopportune times and refuses to leave, Treasury yields too have been hogging the market limelight.

title: China and Russia's 'profound' ties will not change despite 'turbulent' geopolitical landscape, Xi tells Putin
content: Putin called the partnership "one of the main stabilizing factors in the international arena."
summary: Putin called the partnership "one of the main stabilizing factors in the international arena."

title: IBM stock slips on disappointing consulting and infrastructure revenue
content: IBM's critical software category performed well due to Red Hat's gains, but the consulting and infrastructure segments pulled down overall results.
summary: IBM's critical software category performed well due to Red Hat's gains, but the consulting and infrastructure segments pulled down overall results.

title: Abercrombie & Fitch responds to former CEO's sex trafficking arrest, says it will cooperate with law enforcement
content: Abercrombie & Fitch said it will cooperate with law enforcement after its former CEO Mike Jeffries was arrested on sex trafficking and related charges.
summary: Abercrombie & Fitch said it will cooperate with law enforcement after its former CEO Mike Jeffries was arrested on sex trafficking and related charges.

title: Shares of Peloton surge 11% after David Einhorn says stock is significantly undervalued
content: Peloton has been in the middle of a turnaround and Greenlight Capital's David Einhorn thinks the stock is significantly undervalued.
summary: Peloton has been in the middle of a turnaround and Greenlight Capital's David Einhorn thinks the stock is significantly undervalued.

title: U.S., China trade tariffs escalating would be 'costly for everybody,' IMF deputy director says
content: An escalation of tensions around trade and tariffs would have economic consequences around the world, Gita Gopinath, deputy managing director of the IMF, said.
summary: An escalation of tensions around trade and tariffs would have economic consequences around the world, Gita Gopinath, deputy managing director of the IMF, said.

title: 'Time to be a little bit cautious': Norway's $1.8 trillion wealth fund issues stock market warning
content: Norges Bank Investment Management (NBIM), one of the world's largest investors, says risks are tilted to the downside for global stock markets.
summary: Norges Bank Investment Management (NBIM), one of the world's largest investors, says risks are tilted to the downside for global stock markets.

title: UK's ruling Labour Party rejects accusations of U.S. election interference
content: The U.K.'s ruling Labour Party has rejected accusations by Donald Trump's campaign team that its party members have interfered in the U.S. election.
summary: The U.K.'s ruling Labour Party has rejected accusations by Donald Trump's campaign team that its party members have interfered in the U.S. election.

title: Russia says it has no intention of abandoning Iran as it faces Israel's wrath
content: "We are developing cooperation with Iran in a variety of areas. We intend to do this further," Kremlin Press Secretary Dmitry Peskov told CNBC Tuesday.
summary: "We are developing cooperation with Iran in a variety of areas. We intend to do this further," Kremlin Press Secretary Dmitry Peskov told CNBC Tuesday.

title: September home sales drop to lowest level since 2010
